description:
As a Admin
I want to able to navigate to the 'Manage User' page 
So that I can access its 'Assign Student' functionality

steps.name: Given  Admin is on dashboard page after Login and clicks User on the navigation bar
Given  Admin is in Assign Student details pop up page
When  Admin clicks Save button without entering any data
Then  Admin gets a Error message alert for assign student
